titles.title: A resolution congratulating the students, parents, teachers, and administrators of charter schools across the United States for ongoing contributions to education, and supporting the ideals and goals of the 12th annual National Charter Schools Week.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 5/5/2011--Passed Senate amended. Congratulates the students, parents, teachers, and administrators of charter schools across the country for their ongoing contributions to education and our public school system. Supports the ideals and goals of the eleventh annual National Charter Schools Week (May 1-May 7, 2011).
